text: Takashi Matsui (born 27 February 1940) is a Japanese ski jumper. He competed in the individual event at the 1960 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male ski jumpers Category:Japanese male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Japan Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of Japan Category:Ski jumpers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1960 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Hokkaido
title: Takashi Matsui
